name: Countering Mass Psychic Energy Extraction
description: Neutralizing large-scale energy extraction operations and defending against mass psychological control techniques.

cards.title: Recognizing Mass Energy Draining Events
cards.description: Detecting large-scale rituals and global energy harvesting operations.
bulletpoints: Tracking how fear-based media cycles extract psychic energy.
Identifying global event patterns linked to collective loosh harvesting.
Detecting controlled energy vortexes used for mass extraction.
cards.summaryText: Watch fear cycles, link global events to loosh spikes, and spot engineered extraction vortexes.

cards.title: Counteracting Mass Psychic Warfare
cards.description: Defending against intentional energetic manipulation of the global consciousness.
bulletpoints: Using group meditative shielding to neutralize external psychic attacks.
Developing advanced psionic defense techniques to protect against mind influence.
Leveraging sound frequencies, symbols, and coded language for protection.
cards.summaryText: Deploy group shields, refine psionic defenses, and weaponize protective frequencies and sigils.

cards.title: Rewriting the Collective Frequency Field
cards.description: Reclaiming mass consciousness by shifting global vibrational patterns.
bulletpoints: Generating mass counter-narratives that disrupt fear-based programming.
Harnessing high-frequency media, music, and symbols for collective healing.
Orchestrating synchronized resistance movements through frequency warfare.
cards.summaryText: Seed counter-narratives, broadcast healing frequencies, and coordinate synchronized frequency resistance.
